channel.title: 317 Help With Coding Alot Of Things

item.title: 317 Help With Coding Alot Of Things
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

I’m having problems with my Kalphite Queen & General Graardor (Bandos Boss).
My KQ doesn’t hit high enough, & Graardor wont hit anything at all. But he does attack.
If anyone could give me a code to fix these problems & tell me where to put it that would be great.
And also if someone could give me a code to spawn the 2nd form of the KQ after the 1st form is dead I would like that too.
I’m also getting this error when I compile.

^ client.java:7536: <identifier> expected if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ client.java:7536: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 1) { ^ I’m missing a bracket but I don’t know where.
And my players command is fucked up too. When I type in the command it says the correct amount of players are online but it doesn’t show it in the interface. Here’s a SS.

PlayersOnline.jpg773×556

And here is the command code I’m using.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {

sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()

  • " players!");

sendQuest("@dre@Online Players", 8144);

clearQuestInterface();

sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()

  • “):”, 8145);

int line = 8146;

for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {

client playa = getClient(i);

if (!validClient(i))

continue;

if (playa.playerName != null) {

String title = “”;

if (playa.playerRights == 1) {

title = "Mod, ";

} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {

title = "Admin, ";

}

title += “level-” + playa.combatLevel;

String extra = “”;

if (playerRights > 0) {

extra = “(” + playa.playerId + ") ";

}

sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + “@dbl@ (”

  • title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "

  • playa.absY, line);

line++;

}

}

sendQuestSomething(8143);

showInterface(8134);

flushOutStream();

}[/code]
If anyone could fix that code and repost it the correct way it should be that would be good.
Also, If anyone has a working PK points system, And how to make a PK points shop. I’d probably also need help figuring out where to put the codes too.
I’d also like to know if anyone has anything that could restart my server every 30 mins or so and also gives a message saying "The server will be restarting in “time”. I’m not looking for an application either, just a code I could put in a .java file or in client.java
I’d also like to know if I could get rid of the “players nearby: #” on the screen…
And I’m trying to make it to where all players can use ::message but only mods+ can :S
Here’s the code I’m using…I’ve set the player rights to 0 but still a no go :S

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 0) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("" + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }
